name: orangeade

UK (US orange soda) a sweet fizzy drink (= with bubbles), that tastes like oranges: I would create a range of fizzy pop flavours like lemonade, cherryade and orangeade. a can of orangeade
bhofack2/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
US a drink made by adding water and sugar to orange juice: We brought lemonade and orangeade to the picnic.
